text:
Not one tool alone is going to stop the #COVID19 pandemic. A combination of getting a COVID-19 #vaccine, wearing a mask, staying at least 6 ft away from others, & avoiding crowds are all needed https://t.co/aUCcGB5C4k

Search for nearby vaccine sites here: https://t.co/bzbD9Tu6pE https://t.co/iNDtlEduK2
